tool_description: Retrieves and aggregates historical price and volume data for specified assets over a given time period.

asset_symbols.description: List of asset symbols for data retrieval

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be valid dates.
Data not available: Historical data is not available for one or more symbols in the specified period.
Invalid frequency: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly].
Invalid fields: Supported fields are [open, high, low, close, volume, adjusted_close].
usage: Provide asset symbols and date range. Optionally specify frequency and data fields. Returns time series data for all assets.

date_range.description: Array of dates for which data was retrieved

symbols_retrieved.description: Symbols for which data was successfully retrieved

missing_data_count.description: Number of missing data points across all series
